FROM TB_MERCHANT_CASH_MANAGE m WHERE m.CHASH_ID=#{chashId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MERCHANT_CASH_MANAGE ( CHASH_ID, MCHNT_ID, INS_ID, MORTGAGE_FLG, MORTGAGE_AMT, GET_QUOTA, RECHARGE_AMT, RECHARGE_FACE_AMT, CASH_THRESHOLD_AMT, GROSS_PROFIT_RATE, DATA_STAT, REMARKS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION ) VALUES ( #{chashId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgageFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgageAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeFaceAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashThresholdAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grossProfitRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, '0' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MERCHANT_CASH_MANAGE SET MORTGAGE_FLG=#{mortgageFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MORTGAGE_AMT=#{mortgageAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASH_THRESHOLD_AMT=#{cashThresholdAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROSS_PROFIT_RATE=#{grossProfitRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECHARGE_AMT=#{rechargeAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GET_QUOTA=#{getQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECHARGE_FACE_AMT=#{rechargeFaceAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_STAT=#{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate, LOCK_VERSION=LOCK_VERSION+1 WHERE CHASH_ID=#{chashId}
